description:
Role and Responsibilities

Sunon is looking for a driven individual to help fill out our customer service team as an Order Entry specialist. The right person will be adept at learning and adapting to new systems and processes as we develop the best customer experience department in the industry. The responsibilities for this position are:


Efficiently and accurately inputting, updating, and maintaining orders and salesperson data into the company’s database promptly.

Transferring customer orders into our logistics system and following up with the logistics team to make sure orders are getting processed.

Following up with customers to make sure they receive orders and forwarding concerns and warranty issues to the right department.

Ensuring customer payment is made and recording payments.

Generating customer quotes to assist sales team.

Maintain the showroom and handle administrative tasks.

Keeping a continuous improvement mindset.


Sunon Global is one of the largest furniture manufacturers in the world but are just getting started in the U.S. market. This is an exciting opportunity to experience the growth and rapid change of a startup without the risks. To work at Sunon is to work with a driven team that supports each other and provides opportunities for growth and learning every day.


Qualifications and Education Requirements

AS degree or Equivalent Required

Highly organized

1-3 years order entry experience

Effective communication (written and spoken)

Familiar with MS Office suite and NetSuite

Positive Attitude

Resourceful and a problem solver.


Preferred Skills

Furniture industry/commercial interiors experience

Fluent in Mandarin is a plus


BENEFITS:


Paid vacations

Medical, vision, and dental insurance are available
